programme.title: Quo Vadis TV

Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

programme.title: Summer of Soul
programme.desc: (2021) Joyous, Oscar-winning documentary about the Harlem Cultural Festival: six huge, free, star-studded neighbourhood festivals that encapsulated 1969's swelling Black cultural pride.

programme.title: River
programme.desc: (2023) Farcical time-loop comedy about the staff and guests at a remote mountain hotel condemned to repeat the same two minutes over, and over, and over, and over again. In Japanese/subs.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Mysterious Island
programme.desc: (1961) Sci-fi adventure based on Jules Verne's novel. Two men fleeing the US Civil War find an island inhabited by monsters (animated by Ray Harryhausen) and the mysterious Captain Nemo.

programme.title: Starman
programme.desc: (1984) John Carpenter's sci-fi romance with Jeff Bridges and Karen Allen. An alien is stranded on Earth, where he assumes the form of a widow's dead husband - and finds the locals hostile.

programme.title: The Man from Laramie
programme.desc: (1955) Classic western. James Stewart plays a stranger who arrives in a remote New Mexico town secretly seeking his brother's killer. With Donald Crisp, Alex Nicol and Arthur Kennedy.

programme.title: It Should Happen to You
programme.desc: (1954) Judy Holliday stars in this comedy as a smalltown girl who comes to New York and rents a billboard to publicise her name - and soon she's a TV star. With Jack Lemmon.

programme.title: 13 Going on 30
programme.desc: (2004) Breezy body-swap romcom. Following a disastrous birthday party, teen Jenna wishes she was '30, flirty and thriving'. And boom, she's Jennifer Garner with a fancy flat and a cool job.

programme.title: Beast
programme.desc: (2022) Thrilling romp starring Idris Elba as an all-action doctor who must protect his family from a man-slaying lion in the wilds of South Africa, armed with a jeep and a keen right hook.

programme.title: Seriously Red
programme.desc: (2022) Krew Boylan's musical comedy romance about a lost-in-life young woman who finds her way by impersonating the mighty Dolly Parton. But how far should she tread that glittering path?

programme.title: Wild Card
programme.desc: (2015) Sin City thriller with Jason Statham. A compulsive gambler who does favours for money just wants out of the Vegas life. Just one big win at the tables should do it...

programme.title: Thief
programme.desc: (1971) Crime thriller starring Richard Crenna. A recently paroled thief must do one last job to pay off old debts. But can he get away with it and build a life with his new girlfriend?

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: (2020) Madcap adventure-comedy video game adaptation with Jim Carrey and Ben Schwartz. Can nippy ring-chasing hedgehog Sonic escape the clutches of an evil, moustachioed scientist?

programme.title: Playing with Fire
programme.desc: (2019) Fun-filled family comedy starring John Cena. A macho fireman has to babysit three impish kids after saving them from a blaze in the remote California woodlands.

programme.title: Broken Arrow
programme.desc: (1950) Western starring James Stewart. A gold prospector, tired of reprisal killings between whites and Native Americans, offers a truce to the Apaches' leader. But tensions resurface.

programme.title: Operation Petticoat
programme.desc: (1959) Second World War comedy. Tony Curtis and Cary Grant play members of the crew of a submarine that's painted bright pink just as the Japanese launch their assault in the Pacific.

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: (2004) All-action thriller. Queen Latifah stars as the driver of the fastest taxi in New York, who teams up with an inept cop (Jimmy Fallon) to catch a team of female bank-robbers.

programme.title: Monster Hunter
programme.desc: (2020) Paul WS Anderson's sci-fi action starring Milla Jovovich, based on the game of the same name. A US Army Ranger must fight her way out of a parallel world full of monsters.

programme.title: Underwater
programme.desc: (2020) Sci-fi horror with Kristen Stewart. Disaster strikes at an underwater facility when seabed drilling causes an earthquake, drawing the attention of a lurking menace.

programme.title: Gaia
programme.desc: (2021) Eco-horror. An injured woman is taken by two survivalists to their rainforest hut. But the real threat lurks outside, creeping beneath the forest floor mostly unseen, but familiar...

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Land that Time Forgot
programme.desc: (1974) Fantasy adventure about survivors from a torpedoed First World War ship who end up in a legendary land in the Atlantic where dinosaurs roam. With Doug McClure.

programme.title: The Muppets Take Manhattan
programme.desc: (1984) It's time to put on make-up. It's time to light the lights. Kermit, Miss Piggy, Fozzy, the Blues one and the gang embark on a musical adventure as they try to make it on Broadway.

programme.title: The Call of the Wild
programme.desc: (2020) Touching adventure with Harrison Ford, based on Jack London's classic novel. A big, friendly hound finds himself unwittingly travelling across late 19th-century North America.

programme.title: The Art of Racing in the Rain
programme.desc: (2019) Touching comedy-drama. An ageing golden retriever (voiced by Kevin Costner) tells the story of his life with his best pal, a budding Formula 1 driver.

programme.title: The Day After Tomorrow
programme.desc: (2004) Tense sci-fi thriller starring Jake Gyllenhaal and Dennis Quaid. A scientist sets out to save his son when global warming plunges the world into a sudden climatic catastrophe.

programme.title: Titanic
programme.desc: (1997) Leonardo DiCaprio and Kate Winslet star in James Cameron's Oscar-winning epic. Lovers from across the social divide meet on the doomed luxury liner.

programme.title: The Empty Man
programme.desc: (2020) Supernatural horror about a deadly ghoul that can be conjured by blowing across an empty bottle on an empty bridge. Can a world-weary ex-cop stop the apparently inevitable bloodshed?

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Patrick
programme.desc: (2018) Feel-good British family comedy. Sarah's (Beattie Edmondson) chaotic life gets even more complicated when she inherits a naughty pug from her nan.

programme.title: Muppets from Space
programme.desc: (1999) The Muppets are back in another feature-length adventure as Gonzo, convinced that he is of alien origin, struggles to communicate with his family in outer space.

programme.title: Mr Popper's Penguins
programme.desc: (2011) Family comedy. Jim Carrey stars as a work-obsessed New York property developer whose life is turned upside down when he receives a crate containing six live penguins.

programme.title: First Knight
programme.desc: (1995) Romantic drama based on Arthurian legend, starring Richard Gere, Sean Connery and Julia Ormond. Can nomadic swordsman Lancelot contain his love for King Arthur's fiancée?

programme.title: Django Unchained Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Quentin Tarantino and stars Samuel L Jackson, Christoph Waltz, Jamie Foxx and Kerry Washington talk about making the western adventure set against a backdrop of slavery.

programme.title: The Old Man and the Gun
programme.desc: (2018) Crime biopic. Robert Redford stars as charming 74-year-old robber Forrest Tucker. He's still robbing banks when he falls for farmer Jewel (Sissy Spacek). But the cops still want him.

programme.title: Flamin' Hot
programme.desc: (2023) Eva Longoria directs the real-life story of Richard Montañez - the Latino janitor who invented Flamin' Hot Cheetos, aka the 'world's most popular snack'. Starring Jesse Garcia.

programme.title: Meet the Fockers
programme.desc: (2004) Comedy sequel. What happens when an ex-CIA prude and ageing, sexually liberated hippies become in-laws? Robert De Niro, Barbara Streisand and Dustin Hoffman show you what happens.

programme.title: Shoplifters
programme.desc: (2018) Hirokazu Kore-eda's Palme d'Or-winning drama about a family who survive through petty crime, and whose lives are transformed when they take in an abandoned girl. In Japanese/subs.

programme.title: The 77 Percent The Magazine for Africa's Youth
programme.desc: We meet Buumba Malambo, one of Zambia's youngest politicians who is on a mission to change attitudes. We speak with young people in Cape Town about why they no longer vote. Musical worlds collide at the Beethovenfest and the Dream Catchers Dance Academy in Lagos helps young children stay off the street. Plus, we discover Libreville through the eyes of artist Corail King.

programme.title: McHale's Navy
programme.desc: Lt. Quinton McHale (Ernest Borgnine) and his navy crew concoct a plot to make some money from horse racing results, but the plan flops and they ring up a $2,000 debt to a troop of Marines. When they try to recoup their losses, their ship runs into a building, which only compounds their debt. Soon McHale and the klutzy Parker (Tim Conway) devise a new idea: They will steal a racehorse and enter it in a race in disguise, hoping to win the prize money.

programme.title: This Gun for Hire
programme.desc: Sadistic killer-for-hire Raven (Alan Ladd) becomes enraged when his latest job is paid off in marked bills. Vowing to track down his double-crossing boss, nightclub executive Gates (Laird Cregar), Raven sits beside Gates' lovely new employee, Ellen (Veronica Lake), on a train out of town. Although Ellen is engaged to marry the police lieutenant (Robert Preston) who's hunting down Raven, she decides to try and set the misguided hit man straight as he hides from the cops and plots his revenge.

programme.title: Bunny Lake Is Missing
programme.desc: Single American mother Ann Lake (Carol Lynley) arrives in London with her daughter, nicknamed Bunny, to live with her brother Stephen (Keir Dullea). Ann leaves Bunny at a nursery school, but when she returns there is no sign of her daughter and no evidence that she was ever there. Stephen, a journalist, questions all who might have seen Bunny. Once Scotland Yard Superintendent Newhouse (Laurence Olivier) joins in the search, he unearths several disturbing details about Ann.

programme.title: Loan Shark
programme.desc: An ex-convict (George Raft) acts tough at a tire plant to expose a racket preying on workers.

programme.title: Outlaw Women
programme.desc: A gambling queen (Marie Windsor) and her henchwomen run things until a U.S. marshal (Richard Rober) comes to town.

programme.title: Lightning Guns
programme.desc: The Durango Kid (Charles Starrett) investigates the murder of a banker who was about to loan a rancher some money for a controversial dam project.

programme.desc: Les Feldick was an Oklahoma farmer and rancher with a special gift for teaching the Bible. His simple and nondenominational approach on the program "Through the Bible with Les Feldick" has reached millions around the world with the Gospel of Grace.

programme.desc: The woman who catches Earp's eye is in love with a man who needs Earp's protection from a gang of cattle thieves.

programme.desc: The seemingly meaningless destruction of six busts of Napoleon intrigues Holmes.

programme.title: Raton Pass
programme.desc: Homesteaders help a husband (Dennis Morgan) fight his wife (Patricia Neal) and her gunman (Steve Cochran) for their New Mexico ranch.

programme.title: Hour of the Gun
programme.desc: While the Earp brothers may have won the gunfight at the O.K. Corral, they didn't escape unscathed for long. Seeking revenge over their fallen comrades, members of the Clanton gang go after the Earp family, gunning down both Virgil and Morgan Earp. But they don't succeed at getting Wyatt (James Garner). Now it's his turn to seek revenge. With Doc Holliday (Jason Robards) by his side, Wyatt forms a posse, and they won't rest until every member of the Clanton gang is dead.

programme.title: You'll Never Get Rich
programme.desc: Martin Cortland (Robert Benchley), a philandering Broadway producer, is caught by his wife buying a gift for a chorus dancer, Sheila Winthrop (Rita Hayworth). To save his marriage, Martin insists that dancer Bob Curtis (Fred Astaire) bought the gift, and sets the two up on date. Soon after, Bob is drafted into World War II and sent to boot camp. When Sheila travels to the camp to perform for the troops and visit her real boyfriend, Tom (John Hubbard), she and Bob fall in love.

programme.title: The Brass Bottle
programme.desc: An architect (Tony Randall) finds an old bottle, out of which comes a genie (Burl Ives) eager to do his bidding.

programme.title: The Facts of Life
programme.desc: The Gilberts, Larry (Bob Hope) and Mary (Ruth Hussey), and the Weavers, Jack (Don DeFore) and Kitty (Lucille Ball), are neighbors and close friends -- even though Larry and Kitty always grate on each other's nerves. When the friends' annual vacation arrives, Larry and Kitty are the only ones at the hotel, as their spouses can't make it. Stuck together for the trip, Larry and Kitty, surprisingly, fall in love. The two must now contemplate whether starting over is worth it at middle age.

programme.title: The Lonesome Trail
programme.desc: A group of conniving land-grabbers is deterred from further evil by a Western Robin Hood armed with a bow and arrow.

programme.desc: Ranchers and a new sheriff (Russell Hayden) have trouble with a gold rush.

programme.desc: A young man in a small town is accused of being a thief. Unable to prove his innocence, he leaves town and goes to Hollywood to become an actor.

Now it's his turn to seek revenge. With Doc Holliday (Jason Robards) by his side, Wyatt forms a posse, and they won't rest until every member of the Clanton gang is dead.

programme.title: Cat Ballou
programme.desc: When hired gun Tim Strawn (Lee Marvin) kills her rancher father, Cat Ballou (Jane Fonda) becomes an outlaw set on vengeance. Enlisting the help of washed-up gunslinger Kid Shelleen (also Marvin) as well as the handsome bandit Clay Boone (Michael Callan), Cat strikes back at the land-development company that employed Strawn, and eventually targets the assassin himself. Adding to the lively comedic mood of the film are narrative song performances by Nat King Cole and Stubby Kaye.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Days
programme.desc: Victorian-era Englishman Phileas Fogg (David Niven) proclaims before his fellow members of a London gentleman's club that he can circumnavigate the globe in a mere 80 days, further boasting that he will bet the princely sum of 20,000 pounds on the success of his endeavor. With his stalwart manservant Passepartout (Cantinflas) alongside, he goes forth on his adventure, pursued by a dogged Police Inspector (Robert Newton) who suspects Fogg of chicanery.

programme.title: Allegheny Uprising
programme.desc: A Colonial rebel (John Wayne) fights Indians, a British captain (George Sanders), and a seller of guns and liquor in Pennsylvania.

programme.desc: A GI (John Forsythe) falls for a U.S. ambassador's daughter (Olivia de Havilland) who fights a senator's plan to make Paris off limits.

programme.desc: A circuit judge (Joel McCrea) rides in to break a ruthless cattle baron's stranglehold on a frontier town.

programme.title: The Longhorn
programme.desc: A rustler (Myron Healy) helps a rancher (Wild Bill Elliott) drive cattle from Oregon to Wyoming.

programme.title: Relentless
programme.desc: Framed for a murder he didn't commit, a cowboy hides with a traveling woman as he flees a sheriff and hunts for the real killer.

programme.title: Rio Bravo
programme.desc: When gunslinger Joe Burdette (Claude Akins) kills a man in a saloon, Sheriff John T. Chance (John Wayne) arrests him with the aid of the town drunk, Dude (Dean Martin). Before long, Burdette's brother, Nathan (John Russell), comes around, indicating that he's prepared to bust his brother out of jail if necessary. Chance decides to make a stand until reinforcements arrive, enlisting Dude, an old cripple named Stumpy (Walter Brennan) and baby-faced cowboy Colorado Ryan (Ricky Nelson) to help.

programme.title: Arabesque
programme.desc: When a plot against a prominent Middle Eastern politician is uncovered, David Pollock (Gregory Peck), a professor of ancient hieroglyphics at Oxford University, is recruited to help expose the scheme. Pollock must find information believed to be in hieroglyphic code and must also contend with a mysterious man called Beshraavi (Alan Badel). Meanwhile, Beshraavi's beautiful lover, Yasmin Azir (Sophia Loren), seems willing to aid Pollock -- but is she really on his side?

programme.title: The Harder They Fall
programme.desc: Broke and without work, newspaper reporter Eddie Willis (Humphrey Bogart) agrees to work for the corrupt boxing promoter Nick Benko (Rod Steiger) to help hype his new boxer, Toro Moreno (Mike Lane). While Toro is beastly in appearance, he has no actual boxing talent, and all his fights are fixed. When Toro gets a shot at the title against the brutal Buddy Brannen (Max Baer), Willis is faced with the tough decision of whether or not to tell Toro that his entire career is a sham.

programme.desc: Three men play dirty tricks to charm a beautiful young woman.

programme.title: Wichita
programme.desc: After a group of drunken trail riders runs amok, Mayor Andrew Hope (Carl Benton Reid) of Wichita, Kan., recruits the intrepid Wyatt Earp (Joel McCrea) to end lawlessness. Armed and ready for anything, the new marshal decides he will end gun violence simply by banning guns. Soon Earp must face crooked rancher Clint Wallace (Walter Sande) and whiskey slinger Doc Black (Edgar Buchanan), vicious locals who like Wichita exactly as it is and don't take kindly to being told what to do.

programme.title: Gunfight at Comanche Creek
programme.desc: In 1875, a band of brutal bandits craft a dastardly scheme. First they bust a convicted man out of jail, and then they force him to commit a string of robberies to increase the price on his head. Finally, they murder him and collect the bounty. Lawman Bob Gifford (Audie Murphy) is onto their vicious plan, and he goes undercover as a prisoner to lure in these savage villains. But he struggles to stay focused after crossing paths with a sweet saloon owner (Colleen Miller).

programme.title: Apache Rifles
programme.desc: A U.S. Cavalry officer (Audie Murphy) falls in love with a part-Indian missionary (Linda Lawson) in Arizona.

programme.title: Miss Grant Takes Richmond
programme.desc: Ellen Grant (Lucille Ball) is the worst student at her secretarial school, yet surprisingly, she is hired by real estate agent Dick Richmond (William Holden). It turns out that Dick's real estate office is just a front for a betting operation. When Ellen unknowingly takes a large bet from Dick's old flame, Peggy (Janis Carter), Peggy demands that Dick must either pay up or run off with her. It's up to the dizzy Miss Grant to find a way to extract Dick from this mess.

programme.title: Beat the Devil
programme.desc: Billy and Maria Dannreuther are among a number of travelers stranded in Italy en route to Africa. While the Dannreuthers seem like an average couple, they have the same goal as Mrs. Gwendolen Chelm and some of their other shifty companions -- to lay claim to property that is supposedly rich with uranium.

programme.desc: S1 E2 The caravan continues touring the Imperial Valley and heads towards Ocotillo Wells.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E9 Spirits Rachel falls for a military division agent who has a drinking problem. When his issues start affecting her, Rachel reveals that she's had a problem with alcohol in the past. Meanwhile, with Teaspoon and other riders away, Noah heads a slim crew.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E9 Rendezvous at Red Rock A bank robber guilty of murder frees Cheyenne after he's accused of the crime and lures him in on a deal to rob a bank in Red Rock. However, Cheyenne foils the bank robber's plans after he meets the town's marshal.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E10 West of the River Cheyenne leads a group of stockade prisoners on a mission to rescue two girls kidnapped by the Kiowa five years ago. Along the journey, he begins to wonder if the girls really do want to be returned to their father after all.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E7 The Assailants When Senator Jim Borden visits North Fork, Marshal Micah Torrance receives a telegram stating an assassination attempt could be made on the senator's life. The plot begins to unfold as four gunman disguised as cavalrymen arrive with a Gatling gun.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E8 Mark's Rifle Marty Blair rides into North Fork to promote a circus coming out west from Ohio. Blair is soon under suspicion when there is an attempted robbery at the hotel. Mark finds it hard to believe that Blair is guilty, however, Lucas feels differently.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E9 The Most Amazing Man Wade Randall comes to North Fork and mesmerizes children with big stories of his past gun battles with outlaws. Lucas suspects he is all talk and exposes the truth after Randall refuses to accept a shootout challenge.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E10 Squeeze Play A land speculator named Willard Prescott contacts Lucas about buying his land as the railroad is fast approaching the area. He bribes Lucas and when he refuses, Prescott makes it clear he will stop at nothing to get his land, one way or the other.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E1 Outlaw's Inheritance The townspeople of North Fork begin to get suspicious when Lucas is named as the beneficiary in the will of an infamous outlaw.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E7 Frost Moves In Bubba and Cody rush to get their grass planted before the first frost, but they need a bigger tractor to get the job done. Bubba ends up building a horse stall for a neighbor in exchange for the use of his tractor. Booger's relationship with Jaclyn gets serious, and he meets her son for the first time. Cody and Booger rescue a cow from a huge dirt pit, and Cody receives a load of dirt for the foundation of his dream home. Finally, Kaley surprises Bubba with the news that their baby girl is going to arrive sooner than expected.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E8 An Extra Hand Cody, Bubba, and Booger audition a bunch of local cowboys and non-cowboys to find a ranch hand that can help out when Bubba takes time off to be with his new baby. Bubba and Kaley risk one last trip to Mississippi for a baby shower. Kaley wants to see her family, but they worry that the baby will come early and be born outside of Alabama. After meeting with his banker, Booger is forced to sell off his family's land, but he desperately hopes to find a buyer willing to let him keep a small portion with his grandmother’s house.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E7 Panic Lucas and Mark find a young couple in a wagon who are suffering from a fever. Lucas takes them to his ranch where a doctor confirms it to be yellow fever. No-good Brett Conway spreads the word in North Fork and panic sets in.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E2 Mail Order Groom A mail-order husband arrives in North Fork, and finds not only a bride, but also harassment from two local troublemakers.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Spirit of Truth After his fur trapping expedition is surprised by a Crow war party, legendary mountain man Jim Bridger suddenly finds himself in a desperate struggle to rescue his fellow trappers when one of them goes missing, and another is on the brink of madness.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E3 The Fossil Feud When bloodthirsty Canadian trappers try to kill him, mountain man Jim Bridger takes cover in an unexplored valley. There, he runs headlong into a family of escaped slaves who show him the huge footprints and fossilized bones of long-dead monsters.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E10 Willie Kennard Makes His Mark in History Under siege by gunslingers, the gold mining town of Yankee Hill runs a newspaper advertisement to find a new marshal. Former slave and Union soldier Willie Kennard answers the ad, but he faces prejudice and doubt as he works to restore law and order.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E11 John Wesley Hardin: Killer on the Texas Frontier When outlaw John Wesley Hardin murders a sheriff, a hard-charging Texas Ranger joins forces with a cool-headed police detective to hunt the killer. The unlikely duo must learn how to work together to end Hardin's reign of terror once and for all.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E5 James Harrod: Kentucky's Founding Father When frontiersman James Harrod founds Harrod's Town on Native American hunting grounds in Kentucky, he soon finds his new settlement under attack. His leadership is tested as he defends the first European settlement west of the Appalachian Mountains.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S4 E7 High Stakes and New Leaders Half of the 14 all-star cowboys have been eliminated. The remaining seven contestants must demonstrate skill and grit in a grueling relay race made up of a series of cowboy challenges. Host Trace Adkins and his expert judges send another cowboy home.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E9 Spirits Rachel falls for a military division agent who has a drinking problem. When his issues start affecting her, Rachel reveals that she's had a problem with alcohol in the past. Meanwhile, with Teaspoon and other riders away, Noah heads a slim crew.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E9 Rendezvous at Red Rock A bank robber guilty of murder frees Cheyenne after he's accused of the crime and lures him in on a deal to rob a bank in Red Rock. However, Cheyenne foils the bank robber's plans after he meets the town's marshal.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E10 West of the River Cheyenne leads a group of stockade prisoners on a mission to rescue two girls kidnapped by the Kiowa five years ago. Along the journey, he begins to wonder if the girls really do want to be returned to their father after all.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E7 The Assailants When Senator Jim Borden visits North Fork, Marshal Micah Torrance receives a telegram stating an assassination attempt could be made on the senator's life. The plot begins to unfold as four gunman disguised as cavalrymen arrive with a Gatling gun.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E8 Mark's Rifle Marty Blair rides into North Fork to promote a circus coming out west from Ohio. Blair is soon under suspicion when there is an attempted robbery at the hotel. Mark finds it hard to believe that Blair is guilty, however, Lucas feels differently.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E9 The Most Amazing Man Wade Randall comes to North Fork and mesmerizes children with big stories of his past gun battles with outlaws. Lucas suspects he is all talk and exposes the truth after Randall refuses to accept a shootout challenge.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E10 Squeeze Play A land speculator named Willard Prescott contacts Lucas about buying his land as the railroad is fast approaching the area. He bribes Lucas and when he refuses, Prescott makes it clear he will stop at nothing to get his land, one way or the other.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E9 New Beginnings Bubba and Kaley welcome their baby girl into the world. When they get home from the hospital, Kaley surprises Bubba with a special gift. Cody lands a big contracting job with a local rancher, but the work needs to be completed in a week. He needs this job to fund the construction of his dream home, so he must get the work done somehow. Booger is beginning to think that Jaclyn might be the one, so he decides to introduce her to his grandma. Finally, the whole gang gets together for a Faith Cattle family barbecue to meet baby Andie.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E10 Season Round Up This special edition of The Cowboy Way: Alabama revisits the action from Season One as cowboy trio Bubba, Cody and Booger build their cattle business. Of course the guys have their hands full wrangling cattle and taming unruly horses, but their personal lives are just as action-packed. Newlyweds Bubba and Cody are getting used to being family men, while Booger struggles through a series of dates on a quest to find the love of his life. Chock-full of season highlights as well as hilarious never-before-seen outtakes, it's an entertaining look at the cowboy way of life.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E5 Strange Town Prisoner Bletch Droshek escapes from Marshal Micah Torrance, and leaves him beaten on a barbed-wire fence. Torrance stumbles to the McCain Ranch and deputizes Lucas to apprehend Droshek at a mining camp run by his brother.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E22 Closer Than a Brother Marshal Micah Torrance loses his confidence in his job of authority and begins drinking again after an old enemy from the past terrorizes him. When Lucas learns of the situation, he invites the man to North Fork and convinces Micah to face his fears.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E6 Fool's Gold After discovering a river filled with gold, Jim Bridger and his fellow trappers believe they are near El Dorado, the mythical Spanish city of gold. But their insatiable greed turns friends into enemies and puts Bridger at risk of a gruesome fate.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E5 A Prince on the Prairie While guiding a hunting expedition, Jim Bridger must deal with an arrogant foreign prince who is abusing his servant boy. But the tables soon turn, when it's the prince who needs rescuing, and his only hope is the long-suffering servant boy.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E5 Wong Fee Lee Stakes His Claim Chinese immigrant Wong Fee Lee joins a convoy of miners headed to Deadwood, where he hopes to strike gold and start a business. But when the Black Hills Bandits stand in their way, Wong must find the strength to lead his fellow prospectors in battle.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E9 Law Comes to No Man's Land Marshal Chris Madsen helps newly appointed judge John Buford bring law and order to Oklahoma's Panhandle in an area known as No Man's Land. After escorting a wagon train of prisoners to Beaver City, they set up their first courthouse inside a saloon.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E4 Mason & Dixon: Trailblazing Surveyors English astronomers Charles Mason and Jeremiah Dixon brave deadly terrain and hostile Native Americans to resolve a border dispute in Colonial America. With science and courage, they survey their famous Mason-Dixon Line with pinpoint accuracy.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S4 E8 The Longhorn Goodbye The remaining 6 cowboys face off in a cutting competition that turns out to be more difficult than expected. Then, they work as a team to sort 4 rogue cattle from a herd and load them on a trailer. Host Trace Adkins and the judges send a cowboy home.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E10 A Tiger's Tale Cody and Noah have the huge task of delivering a tiger to St. Joseph, Missouri, while protecting two nuns and a young lady named Elizabeth. Cody soon falls for Elizabeth. Soon trouble arises when they must fight off hunters wanting the tiger's hide.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E11 Quicksand In order to help a wagon load of traveling settlers in need of rescue and supplies, Cheyenne fights to show his courage against an Indian chief in a pit of swallowing sand. The first one to yell for help loses the fight.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E12 Fury at Rio Hondo As Cheyenne travels through Mexico, he finds himself in an area plagued by political unrest from revolutionaries. He encounters a blonde pickpocket singer in Rio Hondo who happens to be with a man who owes him money from a cattle deal.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E11 Gun Shy After one of Mark's friends dies due to a shooting accident, he is totally against his father having a rifle. Lucas explains in vain the need for a rifle on the frontier, leading to Mark running away. Meanwhile, Lou has problems with a wanted outlaw.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E12 The Anvil Chorus North Fork's blacksmith, Nils Swenson, volunteers to fill in for Marshal Micah Torrance while he is out of town. To keep the peace, Nils starts a policy that everyone turns in their gun upon entry to the town. His plan backfires when outlaws arrive.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E13 Conflict While hunting, Lucas misses an easy shot at a cougar just a few feet away, and seconds from attacking Mark. After discovering that his gun is not the problem, Lucas begins to doubt his abilities with a rifle, leading him to do some soul-searching.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E14 Incident at Line Shack Six Railroad boss John Gangling runs an operation at Line Shack Six. Gangling pays his men in gold and when he finds that Charlie Been saves his wages in a money belt, he kills him for it. An innocent Indian who happens to stop by is accused of murder.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E29 The Score Is Even Lucas and Mark go on a hunting trip and soon become witnesses to a robbery and murder. Lucas subdues the two robbers, but is severely wounded in the process. Lucas struggles to get the robbers to justice, but devises a plan just in the nick of time.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E9 New Beginnings Bubba and Kaley welcome their baby girl into the world. When they get home from the hospital, Kaley surprises Bubba with a special gift. Cody lands a big contracting job with a local rancher, but the work needs to be completed in a week. He needs this job to fund the construction of his dream home, so he must get the work done somehow. Booger is beginning to think that Jaclyn might be the one, so he decides to introduce her to his grandma. Finally, the whole gang gets together for a Faith Cattle family barbecue to meet baby Andie.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E14 Incident at Line Shack Six Railroad boss John Gangling runs an operation at Line Shack Six. Gangling pays his men in gold and when he finds that Charlie Been saves his wages in a money belt, he kills him for it. An innocent Indian who happens to stop by is accused of murder.

programme.title: Kansas Pacific
programme.desc: With talks of a Civil War brewing, Southern saboteurs know they must keep Northern forces from using the U.S. train system. They devise a daring and dangerous plan to stop and capture a railroad engine, preventing the completion of a railroad line.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E10 A Shard of Glass Haunted by the memory of leaving a man to die, mountain man Jim Bridger is determined not to repeat the mistake. When his trapping party runs out of water while crossing a barren desert, Bridger struggles desperately to keep his companions alive.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E2 First Wages Against Lucas' wishes, Mark gets a job at the livery stable in town. Lucas has doubts that Mark can both work and get his chores done on time. Mark finds himself in trouble when he takes a shortcut on an errand and meets a dangerous bank robber.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E14 Skull Lucas and Mark are separated on a hunting trip. During his search, Lucas enters Skull Ranch, a headquarters for outlaws. The gang forces him to help break out two members from jail. Lucas has no choice after he learns they've captured Mark as well.

programme.title: Buffalo Keepers
programme.desc: S1 E1 Today, the buffalo is the quintessential symbol of strength, freedom, and the unspoiled American West. But in the late 1800s, the nation's buffalo were nearly wiped out by ruthless hide hunters. Those majestic herds, which once numbered in the tens of millions, were down to less than 500 animals. This is the story of the handful of determined men and women who mobilized to save the ones that were left in a last-ditch effort to stave off extinction. Ranchers like Charles and Mary Ann Goodnight rescued orphaned buffalo calves and built small herds. Former buffalo hunters like Buffalo Bill helped build public sympathy. And politicians like Theodore Roosevelt helped pass laws to protect the remaining animals. The effort would be a generational one, with buffalo herds carefully tended, bred, and passed down to new stewards when their old protectors passed away. Thanks to their efforts, there are an estimated 500,000 buffalo thundering across America's grasslands once again.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E12 The Battle of Stone Corral When bandits rob a train and gun down a pursuing marshal, they spark one of the largest manhunts in California history. After taking shelter behind the crumbling walls of Stone Corral, they make their final stand against a hail of gunfire.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E1 The Bandit Queen Once a feared gunfighter and sheriff, the legendary Bat Masterson is now working as a newspaperman. He heads west again to uncover the real story of Pearl Hart, the first woman to rob a stagecoach in the Old West. Masterson tracks down Pearl's partner-in-crime, Joe Boot, who shares every daring and surprising detail from his wild days with the notorious Bandit Queen. In a time when outlaws and gunslingers captured the fascination of the American public, Pearl Hart was living proof that in the Wild West a woman could be just as infamous as a man.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E8 Robert Rogers: Frontier Soldier Robert Rogers leads an elite fighting force of fearless rangers behind enemy lines to fight French forces in Colonial America, but one mission tests his men as never before when they must trek 200 miles through the wilderness without food.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S4 E9 The Final Five The five remaining cowboys get to show off their skills starting wild colts and taking them through an obstacle course. Then, they must rope and load as many steers as they can in 30 minutes. Host Trace Adkins and the judges eliminate two cowboys.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E11 Good Night Sweet Charlotte Charlotte, an old friend of Lou's, comes to Rock Creek and stirs up bad memories of a man who had hurt them both. Lou distances herself from Kid, but when Charlotte turns up dead, Lou confronts her past. Meanwhile, Jimmy befriends a Lakota Indian.

programme.title: The Deadly Companions
programme.desc: When a former Army officer accidentally kills a woman's young son, he offers to escort the grieving mother through dangerous Indian territory on the way to lay the boy to rest at the family homestead.

programme.title: Rage at Dawn
programme.desc: In 1866, the Reno Brothers gang is ravaging Indiana. When a detective agency sends a man to infiltrate the gang by posing as an outlaw, he sets a trap to capture the gang during an early-morning train robbery.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E6 The Decision While repairing a fence on his property, Lucas witnesses a murder. The killer, Corey Hazlett, is the son of a wealthy rancher named Frank Hazlett. When Lucas agrees to testify at Corey's trial, there are threats to harm Mark.

programme.title: Kansas Pacific
programme.desc: With talks of a Civil War brewing, Southern saboteurs know they must keep Northern forces from using the U.S. train system. They devise a daring and dangerous plan to stop and capture a railroad engine, preventing the completion of a railroad line.

programme.desc: S3 E11 Good Night Sweet Charlotte Charlotte, an old friend of Lou's, comes to Rock Creek and stirs up bad memories of a man who had hurt them both. Lou distances herself from Kid, but when Charlotte turns up dead, Lou confronts her past. Meanwhile, Jimmy befriends a Lakota Indian.

programme.title: The Deadly Companions
programme.desc: When a former Army officer accidentally kills a woman's young son, he offers to escort the grieving mother through dangerous Indian territory on the way to lay the boy to rest at the family homestead.

programme.title: Rage at Dawn
programme.desc: In 1866, the Reno Brothers gang is ravaging Indiana. When a detective agency sends a man to infiltrate the gang by posing as an outlaw, he sets a trap to capture the gang during an early-morning train robbery.

programme.title: The Gambler
programme.desc: When a card shark receives a letter from a distant and troubled son, he travels to rescue the boy and his mother. During a train ride, the gambler meets a friendly, prideful young card player and shares his wisdom.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E7 Duel of Honor Italian Count Alfredo Di Montova comes to North Fork. His unique clothing attracts the attention of town bully Sim Groder. When Groder pushes the count too far, Montova initiates a duel, and asks Lucas to assist with the rules.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E8 The Safe Guard A new bank opens in North Fork, and banker John Hamilton hires Floyd Doniger for security. However, problems arise when robbers who followed the new safe into town discover their old pal Floyd is the bank guard.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E9 The Sister Rebecca Snipe returns to North Fork after an extended visit. Lucas' son Mark is smitten and plans to play matchmaker for his dad. However, the Snipe brothers get involved to make sure Lucas is good enough for Rebecca.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E10 New Orleans Menace Wealthy Frenchman Cesar Tiffauges, who is used to getting whatever he desires, wants to buy the McCain Ranch. Tiffauges, a sadistic man, abuses his followers regularly with beatings. When Lucas refuses, his son Mark becomes the object of cruelty.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E1 John Colter: King of the Mountain Men As a member of Lewis and Clark's Corps of Discovery, John Colter travels from the Missouri River all the way to the Pacific Ocean, but he decides not to return to the civilized East when the expedition ends. Entranced by the beauty and adventure of the wild frontier, he becomes one of America's first mountain men. As a hunter, trapper and explorer in his own right, he's the first American to see the Grand Tetons and the epic Yellowstone Valley. While his epic explorations make him famous, it's a harrowing ordeal with Blackfeet warriors that makes him a legend. After boldly venturing into territory controlled by the Blackfeet tribe, Colter is captured, stripped naked, and forced to run for his life as warriors give chase in what will come to be known as Colter's Run.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E7 Wild Bill Hickok & the First Quick-Draw Duel Wild Bill Hickok and his buddy, Davis Tutt, see their friendship fall apart over gambling debts and the affections of a beautiful woman. After Tutt swipes Wild Bill's prized timepiece as payback for a disputed debt, things begin to heat up. Then, when Tutt parades through town with the watch in one hand and Hickok's former girlfriend in the other, Wild Bill's blood begins to boil. Tutt refuses to return the watch, and he continues to flaunt the beautiful woman on his arm. The two men meet in the middle of town to settle their differences once and for all in what will become the very first quick-draw duel of the Old West. Both men reach for their pistols at the same time and fire! In an attempt to separate the truth from the fiction, Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, interviews George Ward Nichols, the journalist who immortalized the duel and created the legend of Wild Bill Hickok.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E8 Dr. Susan Anderson: Frontier Medicine Woman Freshly-graduated from medical school, Dr. Susan Anderson sets up a practice in Cripple Creek, Colorado, a rough-and-tumble mining town. At a time when only ten percent of physicians are female, Dr. Anderson faces her share of doubters and has a difficult time attracting patients in the frontier town. When miners suddenly rush into her office with an injured boy, she defies prevailing wisdom and decides to save his mangled arm instead of amputating the limb. The risks are enormous. If the boy's arm becomes infected, and he dies, she will lose everything. Years later, Dr. Anderson relives the story while treating Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, who comes down with fever while passing through Cripple Creek.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S6 E5 Day's Pay Cheyenne arrives in a town held hostage by a gang of bandits. Outlaw Luis Boladas kills young, inexperienced Sheriff Billy Fipps. The town wants to lynch Boladas, but Cheyenne discovers he once saved him from hanging.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E1 Trail of Hate Three bank robbers come to the McCain Ranch and force Lucas into helping them rob the North Fork Bank. One robber stays behind to guard Mark while the other two take Lucas to town. They threaten to kill Mark, unless Lucas cooperates with the gunmen.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E2 Woman from Hog Ridge When Lucas and Mark catch two young men stealing a horse, Lucas is forced into a shootout. He captures one of the men, but Ma Boyle's son is killed in the gunfight. Soon after the killing, the Boyle clan comes to hang the person responsible.

programme.title: Red Headed Stranger
programme.desc: Based on a Willie Nelson song, a spirited preacher and his wife come from the East to Montana to serve a country church. However, when overwhelming problems develop, the preacher must take revenge and attempt to save a town from a gang of cruel men.

programme.title: Black Fox
programme.desc: A former slave and his white blood brother have moved their families from the Carolinas to Texas. When the Civil War begins, their settlement is left unprotected from hostile Indian tribes and the former slave may be the only hope for peace.

programme.title: The Gambler
programme.desc: When a card shark receives a letter from a distant and troubled son, he travels to rescue the boy and his mother. During a train ride, the gambler meets a friendly, prideful young card player and shares his wisdom.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E7 Duel of Honor Italian Count Alfredo Di Montova comes to North Fork. His unique clothing attracts the attention of town bully Sim Groder. When Groder pushes the count too far, Montova initiates a duel, and asks Lucas to assist with the rules.

programme.desc: S1 E1 John Colter: King of the Mountain Men As a member of Lewis and Clark's Corps of Discovery, John Colter travels from the Missouri River all the way to the Pacific Ocean, but he decides not to return to the civilized East when the expedition ends. Entranced by the beauty and adventure of the wild frontier, he becomes one of America's first mountain men. As a hunter, trapper and explorer in his own right, he's the first American to see the Grand Tetons and the epic Yellowstone Valley. While his epic explorations make him famous, it's a harrowing ordeal with Blackfeet warriors that makes him a legend. After boldly venturing into territory controlled by the Blackfeet tribe, Colter is captured, stripped naked, and forced to run for his life as warriors give chase in what will come to be known as Colter's Run.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E7 Wild Bill Hickok & the First Quick-Draw Duel Wild Bill Hickok and his buddy, Davis Tutt, see their friendship fall apart over gambling debts and the affections of a beautiful woman. After Tutt swipes Wild Bill's prized timepiece as payback for a disputed debt, things begin to heat up. Then, when Tutt parades through town with the watch in one hand and Hickok's former girlfriend in the other, Wild Bill's blood begins to boil. Tutt refuses to return the watch, and he continues to flaunt the beautiful woman on his arm. The two men meet in the middle of town to settle their differences once and for all in what will become the very first quick-draw duel of the Old West. Both men reach for their pistols at the same time and fire! In an attempt to separate the truth from the fiction, Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, interviews George Ward Nichols, the journalist who immortalized the duel and created the legend of Wild Bill Hickok.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E8 Dr. Susan Anderson: Frontier Medicine Woman Freshly-graduated from medical school, Dr. Susan Anderson sets up a practice in Cripple Creek, Colorado, a rough-and-tumble mining town. At a time when only ten percent of physicians are female, Dr. Anderson faces her share of doubters and has a difficult time attracting patients in the frontier town. When miners suddenly rush into her office with an injured boy, she defies prevailing wisdom and decides to save his mangled arm instead of amputating the limb. The risks are enormous. If the boy's arm becomes infected, and he dies, she will lose everything. Years later, Dr. Anderson relives the story while treating Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, who comes down with fever while passing through Cripple Creek.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S6 E5 Day's Pay Cheyenne arrives in a town held hostage by a gang of bandits. Outlaw Luis Boladas kills young, inexperienced Sheriff Billy Fipps. The town wants to lynch Boladas, but Cheyenne discovers he once saved him from hanging.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E1 Trail of Hate Three bank robbers come to the McCain Ranch and force Lucas into helping them rob the North Fork Bank. One robber stays behind to guard Mark while the other two take Lucas to town. They threaten to kill Mark, unless Lucas cooperates with the gunmen.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E2 Woman from Hog Ridge When Lucas and Mark catch two young men stealing a horse, Lucas is forced into a shootout. He captures one of the men, but Ma Boyle's son is killed in the gunfight. Soon after the killing, the Boyle clan comes to hang the person responsible.

programme.title: Red Headed Stranger
programme.desc: Based on a Willie Nelson song, a spirited preacher and his wife come from the East to Montana to serve a country church. However, when overwhelming problems develop, the preacher must take revenge and attempt to save a town from a gang of cruel men.

programme.title: Black Fox
programme.desc: A former slave and his white blood brother have moved their families from the Carolinas to Texas. When the Civil War begins, their settlement is left unprotected from hostile Indian tribes and the former slave may be the only hope for peace.

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: It's the late 1800s and a marshal must stop a volatile and growing conflict between homesteaders and cattle drivers in his small town on the Kansas frontier.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E14 Shadowmen A Pinkerton agent comes to Rock Creek in search of a bank robber. Meanwhile, Teaspoon befriends Marie, who claims to be destitute, but Bill and Jesse discover that she is part of an outlaw gang.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E29 The Prodigal A bank robber hides at the McCain Ranch and takes Lucas and Mark hostage. Problems arise when the gunman's mother shows up, believing he owns the ranch and Mark is her grandson. The truth comes out when more gunmen arrive.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E33 Nora An old flame of Lucas' comes to North Fork. After Lucas learns she is sick and her deceased husband spent all her money, he goes to help. However, all is not as it seems as she didn't come alone, and Lucas' good deed involves him in a murder.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E1 Bat Masterson to the Rescue Now without a badge, former lawman Bat Masterson finds himself powerless to help an old friend whose brother has been falsely imprisoned. An overreaching sheriff is intent on seeing the brother hang, so Bat hatches a plan to bust him out of jail.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E11 Al Jennings and the Legend of Dick West Tired of his boring life, attorney Al Jennings dreams of the adventures he reads in dime novels. After a chance encounter with Dick West, Jennings joins the outlaw's gang and learns that a life of crime isn't as glamorous as he thought it would be.

programme.title: Legends of the Stagecoach
programme.desc: A marvel of engineering, the iconic stagecoach becomes indispensable when Americans settle the West. As stagecoaches and their heroic drivers navigate perilous trails to transport passengers and valuables, they are easy targets for lawless bandits.

programme.title: Far Haven
programme.desc: In 1887, Hunter Braddock moves back to Far Haven, Arizona to start over with his two young children, but when his father-in-law is brutally attacked he must take on the corrupt forces strangling the town in order to protect what he loves most.

programme.title: Black Fox: The Price of Peace
programme.desc: A Texas woman falls in love with a Kiowa brave, and chooses to remain with him rather than return to her demanding and abusive husband. Driven by bitterness and rage, the husband soon forms a hunting party set on recapturing his bride, at any price.

programme.title: Suddenly
programme.desc: Three gangsters converge on a small town and invade a family home on the top of a hill near the railroad station. They are planning to assassinate the President of the United States. - This classic suspense film will keep you on the edge of your seat.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E1 Bubba, Cody and Booger: Back in the Saddle Back for a new season of riding horses and roping cows, cowboy trio Bubba, Cody and Booger undertake a huge cattle drive for Cody's brother in-law in Mississippi. Bubba and Kaley wager a bet on who can better handle the other's workload: Bubba tries his hand at babysitting while Kaley does Bubba's ranch chores. As Booger and his girlfriend Jaclyn get more serious, Booger considers taking their relationship one step further.

programme.title: Fight to Survive
programme.desc: Faith, determination and human spirit abound in "Fight to Survive," which recounts stories of people's deadly ordeals in the outdoors. Accompanying survivors back to where harrowing events occurred is rock-climber Craig DeMartino, who is featured in the premiere episode. His right leg was amputated below the knee after a climbing accident, but he continued in his sport. In 2006 he became the first amputee to free-climb the 3,200-foot face of Yosemite's El Capitan in one day. Other stories tell of sailor Steven Callahan clinging to a raft in the Atlantic, fisherman Dean Ririe trapped by a boulder in icy water, and hiker Ted Porter falling into a glacial crevasse.

programme.title: The Verdict With Judge Hatchett
programme.desc: Judge Glenda Hatchett presided over her self-titled courtroom show from 2000-2008. Now, she returns to the medium with "The Verdict." In the half-hour series, the Atlanta native and former juvenile-court judge rules over small-claims cases brought in front of her. Hatchett's courtroom isn't just about finding someone guilty, though. She also uses her experience dealing with young people and her tough-love approach to help send a message to out-of-control juvenile offenders to try to set them on the right track in their lives.

programme.desc: The Stunt Double is back in the shop for its much anticipated reveal and payoff! Inspired by the legendary FALL GUY truck, the Stunt Double is a ground up, frame off build of a classic square body Chevy truck that pays tribute to the stunt world.

programme.title: Sam's Garage
programme.desc: Sam installs new Wilwood brakes on the Summit Racing Bandit Project.

programme.title: Racers Roundtable With Danny Sullivan & Tony Stewart
programme.desc: Presenting drivers that can conquer any car, course or challenge with Kurt Busch, Scott Pruett and Tommy Kendall.

programme.title: 2025 FIM Speedway Highlights
programme.desc: With four riders battling for 4 short laps per race, patience goes out the window and competitors are not afraid to get their elbows out, bang bars and throw aggressive passes for the win.

programme.title: 2025 Supercars Championship Highlights
programme.desc: For over 60 years, this championship has established itself as the premier motorsport series in Australia. Likewise, it has become a favorite all over the world due to its trademark aggressive racing.

programme.title: Racers Unchained
programme.desc: Ford CEO Jim Farley joins Paul Tracy for a passionate conversation about Ford's influence on him since childhood, finding his passion racing vintage cars, and expanding Ford's legacy in motorsports with its return to F1 and growth in off-road racing.

programme.title: RACER Debrief
programme.desc: Off-road racing Hall of Famer Johnny Greaves and his multi-title-winning son, C.J., set the scene for short-course off-road racing's biggest weekend of the year, the 56th annual Polaris Crandon World Championships.

programme.title: RACER Debrief
programme.desc: Next stop for professional Fun-Haver Vaughn Gittin Jr. and off-road and rock-crawling master Loren Healy are the 56th annual Polaris Crandon World Championships.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E10 West of the River Cheyenne leads a group of stockade prisoners on a mission to rescue two girls kidnapped by the Kiowa five years ago. Along the journey, he begins to wonder if the girls really do want to be returned to their father after all.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E7 The Assailants When Senator Jim Borden visits North Fork, Marshal Micah Torrance receives a telegram stating an assassination attempt could be made on the senator's life. The plot begins to unfold as four gunman disguised as cavalrymen arrive with a Gatling gun.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E8 Mark's Rifle Marty Blair rides into North Fork to promote a circus coming out west from Ohio. Blair is soon under suspicion when there is an attempted robbery at the hotel. Mark finds it hard to believe that Blair is guilty, however, Lucas feels differently.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E9 The Most Amazing Man Wade Randall comes to North Fork and mesmerizes children with big stories of his past gun battles with outlaws. Lucas suspects he is all talk and exposes the truth after Randall refuses to accept a shootout challenge.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E10 Squeeze Play A land speculator named Willard Prescott contacts Lucas about buying his land as the railroad is fast approaching the area. He bribes Lucas and when he refuses, Prescott makes it clear he will stop at nothing to get his land, one way or the other.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E1 Outlaw's Inheritance The townspeople of North Fork begin to get suspicious when Lucas is named as the beneficiary in the will of an infamous outlaw.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E7 Frost Moves In Bubba and Cody rush to get their grass planted before the first frost, but they need a bigger tractor to get the job done. Bubba ends up building a horse stall for a neighbor in exchange for the use of his tractor. Booger's relationship with Jaclyn gets serious, and he meets her son for the first time. Cody and Booger rescue a cow from a huge dirt pit, and Cody receives a load of dirt for the foundation of his dream home. Finally, Kaley surprises Bubba with the news that their baby girl is going to arrive sooner than expected.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E8 An Extra Hand Cody, Bubba, and Booger audition a bunch of local cowboys and non-cowboys to find a ranch hand that can help out when Bubba takes time off to be with his new baby. Bubba and Kaley risk one last trip to Mississippi for a baby shower. Kaley wants to see her family, but they worry that the baby will come early and be born outside of Alabama. After meeting with his banker, Booger is forced to sell off his family's land, but he desperately hopes to find a buyer willing to let him keep a small portion with his grandmother’s house.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E7 Panic Lucas and Mark find a young couple in a wagon who are suffering from a fever. Lucas takes them to his ranch where a doctor confirms it to be yellow fever. No-good Brett Conway spreads the word in North Fork and panic sets in.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E2 Mail Order Groom A mail-order husband arrives in North Fork, and finds not only a bride, but also harassment from two local troublemakers.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Spirit of Truth After his fur trapping expedition is surprised by a Crow war party, legendary mountain man Jim Bridger suddenly finds himself in a desperate struggle to rescue his fellow trappers when one of them goes missing, and another is on the brink of madness.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E3 The Fossil Feud When bloodthirsty Canadian trappers try to kill him, mountain man Jim Bridger takes cover in an unexplored valley. There, he runs headlong into a family of escaped slaves who show him the huge footprints and fossilized bones of long-dead monsters.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E10 Willie Kennard Makes His Mark in History Under siege by gunslingers, the gold mining town of Yankee Hill runs a newspaper advertisement to find a new marshal. Former slave and Union soldier Willie Kennard answers the ad, but he faces prejudice and doubt as he works to restore law and order.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E11 John Wesley Hardin: Killer on the Texas Frontier When outlaw John Wesley Hardin murders a sheriff, a hard-charging Texas Ranger joins forces with a cool-headed police detective to hunt the killer. The unlikely duo must learn how to work together to end Hardin's reign of terror once and for all.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E5 James Harrod: Kentucky's Founding Father When frontiersman James Harrod founds Harrod's Town on Native American hunting grounds in Kentucky, he soon finds his new settlement under attack. His leadership is tested as he defends the first European settlement west of the Appalachian Mountains.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S4 E7 High Stakes and New Leaders Half of the 14 all-star cowboys have been eliminated. The remaining seven contestants must demonstrate skill and grit in a grueling relay race made up of a series of cowboy challenges. Host Trace Adkins and his expert judges send another cowboy home.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E9 Spirits Rachel falls for a military division agent who has a drinking problem. When his issues start affecting her, Rachel reveals that she's had a problem with alcohol in the past. Meanwhile, with Teaspoon and other riders away, Noah heads a slim crew.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E9 Rendezvous at Red Rock A bank robber guilty of murder frees Cheyenne after he's accused of the crime and lures him in on a deal to rob a bank in Red Rock. However, Cheyenne foils the bank robber's plans after he meets the town's marshal.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E10 West of the River Cheyenne leads a group of stockade prisoners on a mission to rescue two girls kidnapped by the Kiowa five years ago. Along the journey, he begins to wonder if the girls really do want to be returned to their father after all.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E7 The Assailants When Senator Jim Borden visits North Fork, Marshal Micah Torrance receives a telegram stating an assassination attempt could be made on the senator's life. The plot begins to unfold as four gunman disguised as cavalrymen arrive with a Gatling gun.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E8 Mark's Rifle Marty Blair rides into North Fork to promote a circus coming out west from Ohio. Blair is soon under suspicion when there is an attempted robbery at the hotel. Mark finds it hard to believe that Blair is guilty, however, Lucas feels differently.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E9 The Most Amazing Man Wade Randall comes to North Fork and mesmerizes children with big stories of his past gun battles with outlaws. Lucas suspects he is all talk and exposes the truth after Randall refuses to accept a shootout challenge.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E10 Squeeze Play A land speculator named Willard Prescott contacts Lucas about buying his land as the railroad is fast approaching the area. He bribes Lucas and when he refuses, Prescott makes it clear he will stop at nothing to get his land, one way or the other.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E9 New Beginnings Bubba and Kaley welcome their baby girl into the world. When they get home from the hospital, Kaley surprises Bubba with a special gift. Cody lands a big contracting job with a local rancher, but the work needs to be completed in a week. He needs this job to fund the construction of his dream home, so he must get the work done somehow. Booger is beginning to think that Jaclyn might be the one, so he decides to introduce her to his grandma. Finally, the whole gang gets together for a Faith Cattle family barbecue to meet baby Andie.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E10 Season Round Up This special edition of The Cowboy Way: Alabama revisits the action from Season One as cowboy trio Bubba, Cody and Booger build their cattle business. Of course the guys have their hands full wrangling cattle and taming unruly horses, but their personal lives are just as action-packed. Newlyweds Bubba and Cody are getting used to being family men, while Booger struggles through a series of dates on a quest to find the love of his life. Chock-full of season highlights as well as hilarious never-before-seen outtakes, it's an entertaining look at the cowboy way of life.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E5 Strange Town Prisoner Bletch Droshek escapes from Marshal Micah Torrance, and leaves him beaten on a barbed-wire fence. Torrance stumbles to the McCain Ranch and deputizes Lucas to apprehend Droshek at a mining camp run by his brother.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E22 Closer Than a Brother Marshal Micah Torrance loses his confidence in his job of authority and begins drinking again after an old enemy from the past terrorizes him. When Lucas learns of the situation, he invites the man to North Fork and convinces Micah to face his fears.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E6 Fool's Gold After discovering a river filled with gold, Jim Bridger and his fellow trappers believe they are near El Dorado, the mythical Spanish city of gold. But their insatiable greed turns friends into enemies and puts Bridger at risk of a gruesome fate.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E5 A Prince on the Prairie While guiding a hunting expedition, Jim Bridger must deal with an arrogant foreign prince who is abusing his servant boy. But the tables soon turn, when it's the prince who needs rescuing, and his only hope is the long-suffering servant boy.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E5 Wong Fee Lee Stakes His Claim Chinese immigrant Wong Fee Lee joins a convoy of miners headed to Deadwood, where he hopes to strike gold and start a business. But when the Black Hills Bandits stand in their way, Wong must find the strength to lead his fellow prospectors in battle.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E9 Law Comes to No Man's Land Marshal Chris Madsen helps newly appointed judge John Buford bring law and order to Oklahoma's Panhandle in an area known as No Man's Land. After escorting a wagon train of prisoners to Beaver City, they set up their first courthouse inside a saloon.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E4 Mason & Dixon: Trailblazing Surveyors English astronomers Charles Mason and Jeremiah Dixon brave deadly terrain and hostile Native Americans to resolve a border dispute in Colonial America. With science and courage, they survey their famous Mason-Dixon Line with pinpoint accuracy.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S4 E8 The Longhorn Goodbye The remaining 6 cowboys face off in a cutting competition that turns out to be more difficult than expected. Then, they work as a team to sort 4 rogue cattle from a herd and load them on a trailer. Host Trace Adkins and the judges send a cowboy home.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E10 A Tiger's Tale Cody and Noah have the huge task of delivering a tiger to St. Joseph, Missouri, while protecting two nuns and a young lady named Elizabeth. Cody soon falls for Elizabeth. Soon trouble arises when they must fight off hunters wanting the tiger's hide.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E11 Quicksand In order to help a wagon load of traveling settlers in need of rescue and supplies, Cheyenne fights to show his courage against an Indian chief in a pit of swallowing sand. The first one to yell for help loses the fight.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E12 Fury at Rio Hondo As Cheyenne travels through Mexico, he finds himself in an area plagued by political unrest from revolutionaries. He encounters a blonde pickpocket singer in Rio Hondo who happens to be with a man who owes him money from a cattle deal.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E11 Gun Shy After one of Mark's friends dies due to a shooting accident, he is totally against his father having a rifle. Lucas explains in vain the need for a rifle on the frontier, leading to Mark running away. Meanwhile, Lou has problems with a wanted outlaw.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E12 The Anvil Chorus North Fork's blacksmith, Nils Swenson, volunteers to fill in for Marshal Micah Torrance while he is out of town. To keep the peace, Nils starts a policy that everyone turns in their gun upon entry to the town. His plan backfires when outlaws arrive.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E13 Conflict While hunting, Lucas misses an easy shot at a cougar just a few feet away, and seconds from attacking Mark. After discovering that his gun is not the problem, Lucas begins to doubt his abilities with a rifle, leading him to do some soul-searching.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E14 Incident at Line Shack Six Railroad boss John Gangling runs an operation at Line Shack Six. Gangling pays his men in gold and when he finds that Charlie Been saves his wages in a money belt, he kills him for it. An innocent Indian who happens to stop by is accused of murder.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E29 The Score Is Even Lucas and Mark go on a hunting trip and soon become witnesses to a robbery and murder. Lucas subdues the two robbers, but is severely wounded in the process. Lucas struggles to get the robbers to justice, but devises a plan just in the nick of time.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E9 New Beginnings Bubba and Kaley welcome their baby girl into the world. When they get home from the hospital, Kaley surprises Bubba with a special gift. Cody lands a big contracting job with a local rancher, but the work needs to be completed in a week. He needs this job to fund the construction of his dream home, so he must get the work done somehow. Booger is beginning to think that Jaclyn might be the one, so he decides to introduce her to his grandma. Finally, the whole gang gets together for a Faith Cattle family barbecue to meet baby Andie.

programme.desc: S5 E12 The Anvil Chorus North Fork's blacksmith, Nils Swenson, volunteers to fill in for Marshal Micah Torrance while he is out of town. To keep the peace, Nils starts a policy that everyone turns in their gun upon entry to the town. His plan backfires when outlaws arrive.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E13 Conflict While hunting, Lucas misses an easy shot at a cougar just a few feet away, and seconds from attacking Mark. After discovering that his gun is not the problem, Lucas begins to doubt his abilities with a rifle, leading him to do some soul-searching.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E14 Incident at Line Shack Six Railroad boss John Gangling runs an operation at Line Shack Six. Gangling pays his men in gold and when he finds that Charlie Been saves his wages in a money belt, he kills him for it. An innocent Indian who happens to stop by is accused of murder.

programme.title: Kansas Pacific
programme.desc: With talks of a Civil War brewing, Southern saboteurs know they must keep Northern forces from using the U.S. train system. They devise a daring and dangerous plan to stop and capture a railroad engine, preventing the completion of a railroad line.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E10 A Shard of Glass Haunted by the memory of leaving a man to die, mountain man Jim Bridger is determined not to repeat the mistake. When his trapping party runs out of water while crossing a barren desert, Bridger struggles desperately to keep his companions alive.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E2 First Wages Against Lucas' wishes, Mark gets a job at the livery stable in town. Lucas has doubts that Mark can both work and get his chores done on time. Mark finds himself in trouble when he takes a shortcut on an errand and meets a dangerous bank robber.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E14 Skull Lucas and Mark are separated on a hunting trip. During his search, Lucas enters Skull Ranch, a headquarters for outlaws. The gang forces him to help break out two members from jail. Lucas has no choice after he learns they've captured Mark as well.

programme.title: Buffalo Keepers
programme.desc: S1 E1 Today, the buffalo is the quintessential symbol of strength, freedom, and the unspoiled American West. But in the late 1800s, the nation's buffalo were nearly wiped out by ruthless hide hunters. Those majestic herds, which once numbered in the tens of millions, were down to less than 500 animals. This is the story of the handful of determined men and women who mobilized to save the ones that were left in a last-ditch effort to stave off extinction. Ranchers like Charles and Mary Ann Goodnight rescued orphaned buffalo calves and built small herds. Former buffalo hunters like Buffalo Bill helped build public sympathy. And politicians like Theodore Roosevelt helped pass laws to protect the remaining animals. The effort would be a generational one, with buffalo herds carefully tended, bred, and passed down to new stewards when their old protectors passed away. Thanks to their efforts, there are an estimated 500,000 buffalo thundering across America's grasslands once again.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E12 The Battle of Stone Corral When bandits rob a train and gun down a pursuing marshal, they spark one of the largest manhunts in California history. After taking shelter behind the crumbling walls of Stone Corral, they make their final stand against a hail of gunfire.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E1 The Bandit Queen Once a feared gunfighter and sheriff, the legendary Bat Masterson is now working as a newspaperman. He heads west again to uncover the real story of Pearl Hart, the first woman to rob a stagecoach in the Old West. Masterson tracks down Pearl's partner-in-crime, Joe Boot, who shares every daring and surprising detail from his wild days with the notorious Bandit Queen. In a time when outlaws and gunslingers captured the fascination of the American public, Pearl Hart was living proof that in the Wild West a woman could be just as infamous as a man.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E8 Robert Rogers: Frontier Soldier Robert Rogers leads an elite fighting force of fearless rangers behind enemy lines to fight French forces in Colonial America, but one mission tests his men as never before when they must trek 200 miles through the wilderness without food.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S4 E9 The Final Five The five remaining cowboys get to show off their skills starting wild colts and taking them through an obstacle course. Then, they must rope and load as many steers as they can in 30 minutes. Host Trace Adkins and the judges eliminate two cowboys.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E11 Good Night Sweet Charlotte Charlotte, an old friend of Lou's, comes to Rock Creek and stirs up bad memories of a man who had hurt them both. Lou distances herself from Kid, but when Charlotte turns up dead, Lou confronts her past. Meanwhile, Jimmy befriends a Lakota Indian.

programme.title: The Deadly Companions
programme.desc: When a former Army officer accidentally kills a woman's young son, he offers to escort the grieving mother through dangerous Indian territory on the way to lay the boy to rest at the family homestead.

programme.title: Rage at Dawn
programme.desc: In 1866, the Reno Brothers gang is ravaging Indiana. When a detective agency sends a man to infiltrate the gang by posing as an outlaw, he sets a trap to capture the gang during an early-morning train robbery.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E6 The Decision While repairing a fence on his property, Lucas witnesses a murder. The killer, Corey Hazlett, is the son of a wealthy rancher named Frank Hazlett. When Lucas agrees to testify at Corey's trial, there are threats to harm Mark.

programme.title: Kansas Pacific
programme.desc: With talks of a Civil War brewing, Southern saboteurs know they must keep Northern forces from using the U.S. train system. They devise a daring and dangerous plan to stop and capture a railroad engine, preventing the completion of a railroad line.
